title.description: A blue, centered title at the top of the page.

score.description: Numeric score that sits below the title, representing user's alcohol intake.

ButtonGroup.description: Three horizontally-aligned buttons of equal width. A clicked button changes to a darker shade.
ButtonGroup.useCase: User selects a drink type, which then displays relevant options in the ListView.

ListView.description: List of clickable options displayed vertically. Each option has a light grey background and black text.
ListView.behavior: Upon selecting an option, the score at the top updates instantly without requiring a page refresh.

successNotification.description: A toast notification that appears for 3 seconds after a drink is added.

useCaseScenario: John opens the app, selects 'Wine' and then '5oz, 12%'. The score updates, and he sees a green toast notification.
